messages.content: Namaste, mujhe hindi me naye shabd sikhne hai. Apne baare me kuch batao.

Namaste! Main ek sahayak hoon jo aapki Hindi seekhne mein madad karta hoon. ðŸ˜Š  
Main **rozana** (daily) logon ke saath baat karta hoon, unki **samajh** (understanding) badhata hoon, aur unhe **sahaj** (easily) Hindi bolne mein madad karta hoon.  
Aap kya seekhna chahte hain? Kahaani? Vyaakaran? Ya rozmarra ki baat-cheet?
